representation_information.name: Material Exchange Format (MXF)
representation_information.description: Format Description for MXF -- Object-based file format that wraps video, audio, and other bitstreams ('essences'), optimized for the interchange or archiving by the content creation industries. In effect, the format bundles the essences and what amounts to an 'edit decision list' (data used by audio-visual content editing systems) in an unambiguous way that is essence-agnostic and metadata-aware.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
